tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My self swapnaThe joy of embracing twins through IVF is immeasurable, and we owe it all to our incredible doctor  Sita garimella whose expertise and care made it possible. Their guidance and support have filled our hearts with profound gratitude and happiness.

Consultation goes in a phased manner, no hurry with medication and high dose medicines. Dr. Sita understands the current situation and suggest what can be done and when it has to be done. Thanks for her support in reviewing the reports and suggesting medicines even during the late hours of the day. Oflate, it's very tough to find a trustworthy doctor, *** ******* ** ****** ************* *** sees multiple possibilities before starting the treatment.

we had a consultation during planning our pregnancy. She is so friendly and cares about her patients a lot. She explains all the procedures/options well and suggests the **** treatments. The treatment is still ongoing and we are very happy about the way she treats her patients.

I referred Dr. Sita's name to my friend's daughter. She hasn't conceived after five years of marriage. After three sittings, she conceived and now she is blessed with a baby. They are very happy with the way Dr. Sita treated her. As they are uneducated, I am keeping review on their behalf.

She is soo calm, soo patient, so friendly, she always greets us with a smile and she remembers all our medical history. She has so much positivity in her that our worries/tensions will go away after talking to her. She will listen to all our questions and answers them very clearly. She will make things look light instead of scaring the patients. She used to be available on the phone all the time which is a very positive thing about her. I would highly recommend her to all of you who are reading my review. You can close your eyes and go visit the doctor and have a positive result. A simple thanks will not be sufficient for her. Thank you sooooo much mam for making us have a happy :-)

Dr. Sita is a  wonderfulperson. She not only makes you feel comfortable with her friendly approach but gives you a clear treatment plan on the way forward. It is never a monologue with her and she always involves your views and opinionat every step.She has seen it all but still makes you feelgenuinely special and your concerns important.She is direct and transparent in her treatmentmethods, feedback, and outcome with no falsepromises or sugar-coating. Despite a hectic barrage of patients and procedures,she never fails to greet you with a genuinesmile. It is amazing how she remembersthe case and status of every single patient. Amazing experience. Highly recommended.

My self Hemanta com from Odisha,Dr.Sita Madam is Very good
She is a Great person...  Good Behaviour.. i really appreciate...
